trans-unit.source:
You see all upcoming events known to Xenim in your event list. However some podcasters do not schedule their livestream before actually doing the show.
If you want to see the shows scheduled before taking place, please talk to the podcaster so they schedule the event next time.
trans-unit.target:
Du siehst alle geplanten Folgen in der Event Übersicht. Einige Podcast kündigen ihre Sendungen allerdings nicht rechtzeitig an.
Wenn du Sendungen eines Podcast im Voraus im Kalender sehen möchtest, dann bitte den Podcaster darum die Sendung rechtzeitig bei Xenim anzukündigen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "You see all upcoming events known to Xenim in your event list. However some podcasters do not schedule their livestream before actually doing the show.\n\nIf you want to see the shows scheduled before taking place, please talk to the podcaster so they schedule the event next time."; ObjectID = "8hl-TQ-7Bs";

trans-unit.source: This app only supports podcasts which do livestreams via the Xenim streaming network.
trans-unit.target: Diese App unterstützt nur Podcasts, die ihren Livestream über das Xenim Streaming Network senden.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "This app only supports podcasts which do livestreams via the Xenim streaming network."; ObjectID = "KP9-IT-5RM";

trans-unit.source: Why can I not listen to this event though it is scheduled to be live now?
trans-unit.target: Warum kann ich diese Livesendung nicht hören, obwohl sie als live angezeigt wird?
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Why can I not listen to this event though it is scheduled to be live now?"; ObjectID = "Z1k-Rx-IsW";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Report a bug on Github"; ObjectID = "ZDd-88-y9e";

trans-unit.source: Your question has not been answered? Feel free to contect us.
trans-unit.target: Deine Frage wurde nicht beantwortet? Du kannst dich gerne direkt an uns wenden.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Your question has not been answered? Feel free to contect us."; ObjectID = "aNZ-gq-i0L";

trans-unit.source: Stefan Trauth Alte Rathausstraße 15 76467 Bietigheim mail@stefantrauth.de
trans-unit.target: Stefan Trauth Alte Rathausstraße 15 76467 Bietigheim mail@stefantrauth.de
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Stefan Trauth Alte Rathausstraße 15 76467 Bietigheim\nmail@stefantrauth.de"; ObjectID = "d9H-Fy-TUN";

trans-unit.source: Why could I not see a livestream as an upcoming event before it started?
trans-unit.target: Warum konnte ich einen Livestream nicht als angekündigt im Kalender sehen, bevor die Sendung losging?
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Why could I not see a livestream as an upcoming event before it started?"; ObjectID = "lZw-LZ-4jq";

trans-unit.source: Why can I not find my favorite podcast show here though it does live shows?
trans-unit.target: Warum kann ich meinen Lieblingspodcast nicht hier finden, obwohl er Livesendungen macht?
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Why can I not find my favorite podcast show here though it does live shows?"; ObjectID = "mV7-DQ-bPK";

trans-unit.source:
This app features podcast livestreams from the Xenim streaming network. It is developed by Stefan Trauth.
You can find the code as Open Source on Github.
Special thanks for helping to develop the app goes to: @_cato, @ePirat, @ugo
Pods this app uses: Alamofire, AlamofireImage, Alamofire, Bolts/Tasks, CRToast, KDEAudioPlayer, MarqueeLabel-Swift, Parse, Bolts/Tasks, SwiftyJSON
trans-unit.target:
Diese App präsentiert euch Podcast Livestreams des Xenim Streaming Networks. Die App wurde von Stefan Trauth entwickelt.
Der Code ist Open Source und steht auf Github.
Besonderen Dank an @_cato, @ePirat und @ugo für die Unterstützung bei der Entwicklung der App.
Verwendete Pods: Alamofire, AlamofireImage, Bolts/Tasks, CRToast, KDEAudioPlayer, MarqeeLabel-Swift, Parse, SwiftyJSON
trans-unit.note:
Class = "UILabel"; text = "This app features podcast livestreams from the Xenim streaming network. It is developed by Stefan Trauth.

You can find the code as Open Source on Github.

Special thanks for helping to develop the app goes to: @_cato, @ePirat, @ugo

Pods this app uses: Alamofire, AlamofireImage, Alamofire, Bolts/Tasks, CRToast, KDEAudioPlayer, MarqueeLabel-Swift, Parse, Bolts/Tasks, SwiftyJSON"; ObjectID = "ukR-HY-Eol";

trans-unit.source: Sometimes podcasters schedule their event for a specific time but can not start the show right in time. Try checking out their website or their Twitter account for more information.
trans-unit.target: Manchmal beginnen Podcaster den Livestream nicht genau zu der Zeit wie sie es im Kalender angekündigt haben. Das kann verschiedene Gründe haben. Schaue auf ihre Webseite oder ihren Twitter Account, um Informationen zu bekommen.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Sometimes podcasters schedule their event for a specific time but can not start the show right in time. Try checking out their website or their Twitter account for more information."; ObjectID = "zjp-PR-i3k";

trans-unit.source: You will receive push notifications if any of your favorite podcasts does a live show.
trans-unit.target: Du erhältst Push Notifications sobald einer deiner Lieblingspodcasts eine Livesendung startet.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "You will receive push notifications if any of your favorite podcasts does a live show."; ObjectID = "zkh-v8-yay";
this message gets displayed if add favorites table view controller does not have any item to display

trans-unit.source: This is a filtered event list. You only see events of your favorite shows here. Currently there are no events of your favorite podcasts scheduled.
trans-unit.target: Das ist eine gefilterte Liste. Hier findest du nur Events deiner Favoriten. Aktuell hat keiner deiner Favoriten einen Livestream geplant.
trans-unit.note: this message gets displayed if the user filters the event tableview to only show favorites, but there are not events to display.

trans-unit.source: Did not receive any upcoming events. Pull to refresh to try again.
trans-unit.target: Es konntent keine Daten geladen werden. Pull to Refresh, um es noch einmal zu versuchen.
trans-unit.note: this message gets displayed if no events could be displayed / fetched from the API
section header in event table view for the later than next week section
section header in event table view for the live now section
section header in event table view for the later this week section
section header in event table view for the upcoming today section
section header in event table view for the tomorrow section
Loading message while loading next event date
Loading message while loading next event date
Tells the user in how many dates the event takes place. It is a formatted string like 'in %d days'.
Tells the user that there is no event scheduled in the future

trans-unit.source: Add podcast shows as your favorite to see them here.
trans-unit.target: Markiere Podcasts als Favorit, um sie hier zu sehen.
trans-unit.note: this message is displayed if no podcast has been added as a favorite and the favorites table view is empty.
If the user tried to sent an email and it could not be sent an alert view does show the error message. this is the title of the alert view popup

trans-unit.source: The selected stream can not be played.
trans-unit.target: Dieser Livestream kann nicht abgespielt werden.
trans-unit.note: If a stream can not be played and the player goes to failed state this error message alert view will be displayed. this is the message.
If a stream can not be played and the player goes to failed state this error message alert view will be displayed. this is the title.
long pressing in the player view shows an action sheet to end playback. this is the action message to end playback.
mail body for a new feedback mail message
the user can send a feedback mail to the podcast. this is the preset mail title.

trans-unit.source: Your device is not setup to send email.
trans-unit.target: Dein Gerät ist nicht für den Mailversand eingerichtet.
trans-unit.note: the message shown to the user in an alert view if his device is not setup to send email
when the user clicks on the podcast subscribe button an alert view opens to choose a podcast client. this is the message of the alert view.
the title of the button in a push notification for the action to start streaming the event now
the title of the button in a push notification for the action to show info of the event
remove a favorite by swiping left to edit

trans-unit.source:
Please try to explain your problem as detailed as possible, so we can find the best solution for your problem faster.
Installed Version: %@
trans-unit.target:
Versuche dein Problem so genau wie möglich zu beschreiben. So können wir am schnellsten eine Lösung finden.
Installed Version: %@
trans-unit.note: mail body for a new support mail message

trans-unit.source: Your device is not setup to send email.
trans-unit.target: Dein Gerät ist nicht für den Mailversand eingerichtet
trans-unit.note: the message shown to the user in an alert view if his device is not setup to send email
mail title for a new support mail message
